text:
@realDonaldTrump The Racist Right @POTUS: First he tries to murder the elderly with coronavirus. Then he tries to murder peaceful protesters outside the WH for his own deviant pleasure!

#TrumpOut2020 
#TrumpIsAnIdiot 
#VoteOutTheGOP 
#VoteBlue2020 
#bunkerbabytrump 
#VoteBlueToEndThisNightmare
